sentence: Scott Franklin, and Haley Stevens, we introduced a House resolution  to celebrate that anniversary.

Speaker, today I introduced a House resolution  along with my colleague, Representative Lizzie Fletcher (TX-08), to  reaffirm the principles of the Constitution of the United States of  America, including the separation of powers, checks and balances, the  independence of the judiciary, and the power of Congress to control  spending, declare war, and conduct oversight.
